entry.title: Re @catturd2 Soros figured out a clever arbitrage opportunity: The many small political contests, such as DAs & judges, have much higher impact per do...
entry.summary: Re @catturd2 Soros figured out a clever arbitrage opportunity: The many small political contests, such as DAs & judges, have much higher impact per dollar spent than the big races, so it is far easier to sway the outcome.

entry.title: Re @POTUS @CommunityNotes I certainly agree that everyone should pay taxes and not engage in elaborate tax-avoidance schemes. Would be curious to hear...
entry.summary: Re @POTUS @CommunityNotes I certainly agree that everyone should pay taxes and not engage in elaborate tax-avoidance schemes. Would be curious to hear how these other “billionaires” are so good at avoiding taxes! We should get rid of GRATs, but maybe other things too.

entry.title: In the coming weeks, Twitter will prioritize replies by: 1. People you follow 2. Verified accounts 3. Unverified accounts Verified accounts are 1000X ...
entry.summary: In the coming weeks, Twitter will prioritize replies by: 1. People you follow 2. Verified accounts 3. Unverified accounts Verified accounts are 1000X harder to game by bot & troll armies. There is great wisdom to the old saying: “You get what you pay for.”
